title: Non-Denominational Christian Schools
description:
Non-denominational Christian schools are faith-based educational institutions that follow Christian teachings without affiliation to a specific church denomination. These schools welcome families from various Christian backgrounds.

Key characteristics of non-denominational schools:

• Bible-based curriculum focused on core Christian beliefs
• Not tied to specific denominational doctrines or traditions
• Often emphasize a personal relationship with Jesus Christ
• Welcoming to families from various Protestant backgrounds
• Focus on biblical literacy and Christian character development
• May have more flexibility in worship styles and practices

Non-denominational schools represent the largest category of religious private schools in Florida, offering families a Christian education without requiring alignment with specific church traditions.

These schools typically focus on foundational Christian beliefs shared across denominations while avoiding theological positions that might divide different Christian traditions.

When considering a non-denominational school, ask about their statement of faith, chapel programs, and how they approach topics where Christian denominations may differ.
